spell_tooltip.description: Thunder Focus Tea provides immunity to Silence and Interrupt effects for 5 sec.
Transcendence: Transfer can now be cast if you are stunned. Cooldown reduced by 15 sec if you are not.
Revival's cooldown is reduced by 16%, and provides immunity to magical damage and harmful effects for 2 sec.

Heals the target for 1.3 million over 6.2 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.

Each heal has a chance to cause a Gust of Mists on the target.

Heals the target for 1.3 million over 6.2 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.

Each heal has a chance to cause a Gust of Mists on the target.

Kick upwards, dealing 449,592 Physical damage.

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.

Kick upwards, dealing 447,453 Physical damage.

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds
Reduces all damage taken by you and your target while channeling Soothing Mists by 6%.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Rising Sun Kick deals 70% increased damage. Spinning Crane Kick deals 10% additional damage.
Increases all healing taken by 4%.
Reduces all damage taken by 6%.
Detox additionally removes all Poison and Disease effects.
Every 10 sec, your next Vivify becomes instant and its healing is increased by 20%.
Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.

Hurls a torrent of Chi energy up to 40 yds forward, dealing 378,298 Nature damage to all enemies, and 398,472 healing to the Monk and all allies in its path. Healing and damage reduced beyond 5 targets.
Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.
Reduces the cooldown of Roll by 5 sec and increases its maximum number of charges by 1.
Increases all damage dealt by 2%.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Increases the range of Leg Sweep by 4 yds.
Touch of Death can now be used on targets with less than 15% health remaining, dealing 35% of your maximum health in damage.
Expel Harm's healing increased by 5% and critical strike chance increased by 15%.
Reduces magic damage you take by 60% for 6 sec, and transfers all currently active harmful magical effects on you back to their original caster if possible.

Turns your skin to stone for 15 sec, increasing your current and maximum health by 20% and reducing all damage you take by 20%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.
Your physical damage taken is reduced by 10% and an additional 10% every 4 sec until you receive a physical attack.
When your healing spells heal an ally whose health is below 35% maximum health, you gain an additional 10% healing for the next 4 sec.
Expel Harm's healing is increased by up to 30%, based on your missing health.
Fortifying Brew cooldown reduced by 30 sec.
Magical damage done increased by 4% and healing done increased by 4%.

When a hit deals more than 12% of your maximum health, reduce all damage you take by 40% for 6 sec.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
Increases your Physical damage done by 4% and Avoidance increased by 4%.
Roll causes you to become lighter than air, allowing you to double jump to dash forward a short distance once within 5 sec, but the cooldown of Roll is increased by 2 sec.

You gain a bonus effect based on your current health.

Above 90% health: Movement speed increased by 5%. This bonus stacks with similar effects.

Between 90% and 35% health: Damage taken reduced by 5%.

Below 35% health: Healing received increased by 10%.
Touch of Death increases your damage by 5% for 30 sec after being cast and its cooldown is reduced by 90 sec.

Wraps the target in healing mists, healing for 557,439 over 7 sec, and increasing healing received from your other spells by 40%. 

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds.

Receive a jolt of energy, empowering your next spell cast:

Enveloping Mist: Immediately heals for 365,715 and is instant cast.
Renewing Mist: Duration increased by 10 sec.
Vivify: No mana cost.
Rising Sun Kick: Cooldown reduced by 9 sec.
Expel Harm: Transfers 25% additional healing into damage and creates a Chi Cocoon absorbing 1.7 million damage.

Surrounds the target with healing mists, restoring 301,350 health over 20 sec.

If Renewing Mist heals a target past maximum health, it will travel to another injured ally within 20 yds.

Encases the target in a cocoon of Chi energy for 12 sec, absorbing 5.1 million damage and increasing all healing over time received by 50%.

Applies Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist to the target.

For every 250,000 Mana you spend, you gain 1 stack of Mana Tea, with a chance equal to your critical strike chance to generate 1 extra stack.

Mana Tea:
Consumes 1 stack of Mana Tea per 0.2 sec to restore 53,550 Mana and reduces the Mana cost of your spells by 30% for 1.00 sec per stack of Mana Tea consumed after drinking.

Can be cast while moving, but movement speed is reduced by 40% while channeling.
Vivify heals all allies with your Renewing Mist active for 146,589, reduced beyond 5 allies.

Rising Sun Kick now kicks up a Gust of Mist to heal 2 allies within 40 yds for 116,705. 

Spinning Crane Kick and Blackout Kick have a chance to kick up a Gust of Mist to heal 1 ally within 40 yds for 116,229.

Heals all party and raid members within 40 yds for 1.7 million and clears them of 3 harmful Magic, all Poison, and all Disease effects.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
The absorb amount of Life Cocoon is increased by 80%.
Mana Tea now channels 50% faster and generates 20% more Mana.

Renewing Mist's heal over time has a chance to cause your next Vivify to also trigger a Zen Pulse on its target and all allies with Renewing Mist, healing them for 191,882 increased by 6% per Renewing Mist active, up to 30%.
Life Cocoon applies Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist to the target.

Summon an effigy of Chi-Ji for 12 sec that kicks up 3 Gust of Mists when you Blackout Kick, Rising Sun Kick, or Spinning Crane Kick, healing up to 2 allies for 115,730, and reducing the cost and cast time of your next Enveloping Mist by 33%, stacking.

Chi-Ji's presence makes you immune to movement impairing effects.
After you fully consume Thunder Focus Tea, your next Vivify triggers Zen Pulse.
Rising Sun Kick and Enveloping Mist apply Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds.
Reduces the cooldown of Life Cocoon by 45 sec.
Increases Enveloping Mist's duration by 1 sec and its healing bonus by 10%.

While active, Yu'lon and Chi'Ji heal up to 5 nearby targets with Enveloping Breath when you cast Enveloping Mist, healing for 183,311 over 7 sec, and increasing the healing they receive from you by 10%.

When activated, Yu'lon and Chi'Ji apply Chi Cocoons to 5 targets within 40 yds, absorbing 1.2 million damage for 10 sec.
Renewing Mist increases its target's healing received from you by 50% for the first 8 sec of its duration, but cannot jump to a new target during this time.

Draws in all nearby clouds of mist, healing the friendly target and up to 4 nearby allies for 164,294 per cloud absorbed.

A cloud of mist is generated every 8 sec while in combat.

Strike the ground fiercely to expose a path of jade for 30 sec, dealing 97,357 Nature damage to up to 5 enemies, and restoring 201,598 health to up to 5 allies within 30 yds caught in the path.

Your abilities have a 6% chance of resetting the cooldown of Jadefire Stomp while fighting within the path.
Reduces the cooldown of Invoke Chi-Ji, the Red Crane by 1 min, but decreases its duration to 12 sec.
Casting Thunder Focus Tea increases your next Crackling Jade Lightning's damage by 2,000% and causes it to chain to 4 additional enemies at 25% effectiveness.

Your abilities reset Jadefire Stomp 100% more often. While within Jadefire Stomp, your Tiger Palms strike twice, your Blackout Kicks strike an additional 2 targets at 20% effectiveness, and your Spinning Crane Kick heals 3 nearby allies for 120% of the damage done.

After casting Jadefire Stomp or Thunder Focus Tea, Ancient Teachings transfers an additional 215% damage to healing for 15 sec.

While Jadefire Teachings is active, your Stamina is increased by 5%.

After using Thunder Focus Tea, your next spell gives 8% of a stat for 10 sec:
Enveloping Mist: Critical strike
Renewing Mist: Haste
Vivify: Mastery
Rising Sun Kick: Versatility
Expel Harm: Versatility

Each time you cast Sheilun's Gift, you learn one of Shaohao's Lessons for up to 30 sec, with the duration based on how many clouds of mist are consumed.

Lesson of Doubt: Your spells and abilities deal up to 40% more healing and damage to targets, based on their current health.

Lesson of Despair: Your Critical Strike is increased by 30% while above 50% health.

Lesson of Fear: Decreases your damage taken by 15% and increases your Haste by 20%.

Lesson of Anger: 25% of the damage or healing you deal is duplicated every 4 sec.
Rising Sun Kick heals all allies with your Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist for 28,240, and extends those effects by 4 sec, up to 100% of their original duration.
Sheilun's Gift heals 2 additional allies and its cast time is reduced by 0.5 sec.

Store vitality from 10% of your damage dealt and 30% of your healing. Vitality stored from overhealing is reduced.

For 10 sec after casting Thunder Focus Tea your spells and abilities draw upon the stored vitality to deal 40% additional healing over 8 sec.
Chi Burst and Chi Wave deal 50% increased damage and healing.
During Aspect of Harmony, Rising Sun Kick, Blackout Kick, and Tiger Palm also withdraw vitality to damage enemies for an additional 20% over 8 sec.
Casting a Physical spell or ability increases the damage and healing of your next Fire or Nature spell or ability by 3%, and vice versa. Stacks up to 5.
Tiger's Lust grants 20% movement speed to up to 2 allies near its target.
Thunder Focus Tea has 1 additional charge.
When cast on yourself, your single-target healing spells heal for 10% more and restore an additional 177,339 health over 6 sec.
Rising Sun Kick, Blackout Kick, and Tiger Palm deal 5% additional damage to enemies in a line in front of you. Damage reduced above 5 targets.
Rising Sun Kick, Blackout Kick, and Tiger Palm contribute 30% additional vitality.
Casting Vivify stores 108,265 vitality, increased based on your recent Gusts of Mist.

When Aspect of Harmony deals damage or heals, it has a chance to spread to a nearby target. When you directly attack or heal an affected target, it has a chance to intensify.

Targets damaged or healed by your Aspect of Harmony take 20% increased damage or healing from you.

Heals the target for 1.3 million over 6.2 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.

Each heal has a chance to cause a Gust of Mists on the target.

Heals the target for 1.3 million over 6.2 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.

Each heal has a chance to cause a Gust of Mists on the target.

Lesson of Doubt: Your spells and abilities deal up to 40% more healing and damage to targets, based on their current health.

Lesson of Fear: Decreases your damage taken by 15% and increases your Haste by 20%.

Lesson of Anger: 25% of the damage or healing you deal is duplicated every 4 sec.
You gain 20% haste for 8 sec after summoning your Celestial.
Rising Sun Kick heals all allies with your Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist for 28,376, and extends those effects by 4 sec, up to 100% of their original duration.
The healing of Enveloping Mist and Vivify is increased by 6%.

Tiger Palm and Vivify have a chance to cause Xuen to claw a nearby enemy for 332,573 Physical damage, healing a nearby ally for 200% of the damage done.

Invoke Yu'lon, the Jade Serpent or Invoke Chi-Ji, the Red Crane guarantees your next cast activates this effect.
Gain Refreshing Jade Wind while Chi-Ji, the Red Crane or Yu'lon, the Jade Serpent is active.
Sheilun's Gift calls upon Yu'lon to decrease the cooldown time of Renewing Mist, Rising Sun Kick, Life Cocoon, and Thunder Focus Tea by 75% for up to 8 sec, based on the clouds of mist consumed.
After Xuen assists you, your next Enveloping Mist's cast time is reduced by 50% and causes Niuzao to grant an absorb shield to 5 nearby allies for 3% of your maximum health.
Refreshing Jade Wind and Spinning Crane Kick have a chance to cause Chi-Ji to grant you a stack of Mana Tea and quickly rush to 5 allies, healing each target for 147,782.

You heal for 10% of your maximum health instantly when you activate Celestial Conduit and receive 15% less damage for its duration. 

This effect lingers for an additional 8 sec after Celestial Conduit ends.
Your movement speed is increased by 75% during Celestial Conduit and by 15% for 3 sec after being assisted by any Celestial.

You switch between alignments after an August Celestial assists you, increasing a corresponding secondary stat by 2%.

Crane Stance:
Haste

Tiger Stance:
Critical Strike

Ox Stance:
Versatility

Serpent Stance: 
Mastery

Celestial Conduit can be recast once during its duration to call upon all of the August Celestials to assist you at 200% effectiveness.

Unity Within is automatically cast when Celestial Conduit ends if not used before expiration.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.

Kick upwards, dealing 457,574 Physical damage.

Applies Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Rising Sun Kick deals 70% increased damage. Spinning Crane Kick deals 10% additional damage.
Increases all healing taken by 4%.
Reduces all damage taken by 6%.
Every 10 sec, your next Vivify becomes instant and its healing is increased by 20%.
While out of combat, your movement speed is increased by 15%.
Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Paralysis by 15 sec and the cooldown of Leg Sweep by 10 sec.

Every 15 sec, your next Rising Sun Kick or Vivify releases a wave of Chi energy that flows through friends and foes, dealing 26,985 Nature damage or 110,282 healing. Bounces up to 7 times to targets within 25 yards.
Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.
Reduces the cooldown of Roll by 5 sec and increases its maximum number of charges by 1.
Increases all damage dealt by 2%.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Increases the range of Leg Sweep by 4 yds.
Touch of Death can now be used on targets with less than 15% health remaining, dealing 35% of your maximum health in damage.
Expel Harm's healing increased by 5% and critical strike chance increased by 15%.
Find resilience in the flow of chi in battle, gaining a magic absorb shield for 1.0% of your max health every 3 sec in combat, stacking up to 10%.

Turns your skin to stone for 15 sec, increasing your current and maximum health by 20% and reducing all damage you take by 20%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.
Your dodge chance is increased by 5%.
Expel Harm's healing is increased by up to 30%, based on your missing health.
Increases your maximum health by an additional 10% and your damage taken is reduced by an additional 10% while Fortifying Brew is active.
Magical damage done increased by 4% and healing done increased by 4%.
Transcendence: Transfer immediately heals you for 10% of your maximum health.
Increases your Physical damage done by 4% and Avoidance increased by 4%.
Roll causes you to become lighter than air, allowing you to double jump to dash forward a short distance once within 5 sec, but the cooldown of Roll is increased by 2 sec.

You gain a bonus effect based on your current health.

Above 90% health: Movement speed increased by 5%. This bonus stacks with similar effects.

Between 90% and 35% health: Damage taken reduced by 5%.

Below 35% health: Healing received increased by 10%.
Touch of Death increases your damage by 5% for 30 sec after being cast and its cooldown is reduced by 90 sec.
You and the target charge each other, meeting halfway then rooting all targets within 6 yards for 4 sec.
Smash a keg of brew on the target, dealing 90,758 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yds and reducing their movement speed by 20% for 15 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Clears 60% of your damage delayed with Stagger.

Niuzao's teachings allow you to shuffle during combat, increasing the effectiveness of your Stagger by 100%.

Shuffle is granted by attacking enemies with your Keg Smash, Blackout Kick, and Spinning Crane Kick.

When you take damage, you have a chance to summon a Healing Sphere.

Healing Sphere:
Summon a Healing Sphere visible only to you. Moving through this Healing Sphere heals you for 377,758.

Rising Sun Kick and Blackout Kick have a chance to summon a Healing Sphere.

Healing Sphere:
Summon a Healing Sphere visible only to you. Moving through this Healing Sphere heals you for 380,004.
Dealing damage with Blackout Kick increases the damage of your next Keg Smash by 10%, stacking up to 4 times.
When you fall below 40% health, you gain an absorb for 30% of your recently Purified damage, or a minimum of 8% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 15 sec.

Drinking from your Brews has a 100% chance to toss a keg high into the air that lands nearby after 3 sec, dealing 64,988 damage to all enemies within 8 yards and reducing their movement speed by 50% for 15 sec.

A swig of strong brew that coalesces purified chi escaping your body into a celestial guard, absorbing 1.2 million damage.

Purifying Stagger damage increases absorption by up to 200%.
When you would be healed above maximum health, you instead convert an amount equal to 40% of your critical strike chance to a heal over time effect.
Rising Sun Kick grants a stack of Elusive Brawler.

Breathe fire on targets in front of you, causing 47,972 Fire damage. Deals reduced damage to secondary targets.

Targets affected by Keg Smash will also burn, taking 39,774 Fire damage and dealing 5% reduced damage to you for 12 sec.
Purifying Brew instantly heals you for 25% of the purified Stagger damage.

Summons an effigy of Niuzao, the Black Ox for 12 sec. Niuzao attacks your primary target, and frequently Stomps, damaging all nearby enemies.

While active, 40% of damage delayed by Stagger is instead Staggered by Niuzao.
Blackout Kick's damage increased by 20% and it strikes an additional 2 targets.
Keg Smash deals an additional 20% damage to targets affected by Breath of Fire.

Fortifying Brew increases Stagger effectiveness by 15% while active.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.
Increases the duration of Stagger by 3.0 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Purifying Brew and Celestial Brew by 20%.
Each time you dodge or an enemy misses you, your next Tiger Palm or Spinning Crane Kick deals 100% increased damage.

After using Breath of Fire, you breathe fire 2 additional times, each dealing 23,888 Fire damage.

Breath of Fire damage increased by up to 100% based on your level of Stagger.

Hurls a flaming keg at the target location, dealing 256,544 Fire damage to nearby enemies, causing your attacks against them to deal 19,887 additional Fire damage, and causing their melee attacks to deal 100% reduced damage for the next 3 sec.
Blackout Kick deals an additional 5% damage. Blackout Kick critical hits grant an additional 1 stack of Elusive Brawler.

Casting Purifying Brew grants a charge of Ox Stance, increased based on Stagger level. When you take damage that is greater than 60% of your current health, a charge is consumed to increase the amount you Stagger.
Keg Smash deals 20% additional damage, and has 1 additional charge.

Blackout Kick also empowers your next ability:

Tiger Palm: Damage increased by 100%.
Breath of Fire: Damage increased by 50%, and damage reduction increased by 5%.
Keg Smash: Reduces the remaining cooldown on your Brews by 2 additional sec.
Celestial Brew: Gain up to 3 additional stacks of Purified Chi.
Purifying Brew: Pauses Stagger damage for 3 sec.

Your main hand auto attacks reduce the cooldown on your brews by 0.5 sec and block your target's chi, dealing 19,887 additional Nature damage and increasing your damage dealt by 1% for 20 sec. 

Upon reaching 10 stacks, your next cast of Rising Sun Kick or Keg Smash consumes all stacks to strike again at 100% effectiveness. This bonus attack can trigger effects on behalf of Tiger Palm at reduced effectiveness.
Rising Sun Kick grants a charge of Ox Stance.

Weapons of Order calls forth Chi-Ji, the Red Crane to assist you for 12 sec.

Triggering a bonus attack with Press the Advantage has a chance to call forth Niuzao, the Black Ox.

Triggering a bonus attack from Press the Advantage or casting Weapons of Order releases a surge of chi at your target's location, dealing Nature damage split evenly between all targets over 8 sec.

 Press the Advantage:
Deals 342,012 Nature damage.

 Weapons of Order:
Deals 684,025 Nature damage and reduces the cooldown of Weapons of Order by 4 for each affected enemy, to a maximum of 20 sec.
Enemies who die within 10 sec of being damaged by a Flurry Strike explode, dealing 119,442 physical damage to uncontrolled enemies within 8 yds.
Striking the same target 5 times within 2 sec grants 1% Haste, stacking up to 10 times.
Your attacks penetrate 12% armor.
Chi Burst, Chi Wave, and Expel Harm now heal you for 20% of damage dealt.

Damage dealt by Fists of Fury and Keg Smash counts as double towards Flurry Charge generation.

Fists of Fury damage increased by 20%.
Keg Smash damage increased by 35%.

When your health drops below 50%, summon Whirling Steel, increasing your parry chance and avoidance by 15% for 6 sec.

This effect can not occur more than once every 180 sec.
Flurry Strikes increase your Agility by 1% for 5 sec, stacking up to 20 times.

Energy spenders deal an additional 20% damage.
Every 50 Energy spent reduces the cooldown of Storm, Earth, and Fire by 1 sec.
Blackout Kick deals an additional 20% critical damage and increases the damage of your next set of Flurry Strikes by 10%.

Every 10 Flurry Strikes, become infused with the Wisdom of the Wall, gaining one of the following effects for 16 sec.

Critical strike damage increased by 30%.

Dodge and Critical Strike chance increased by 25% of your Versatility bonus.

Flurry Strikes deal 193,899 Shadow damage to all uncontrolled enemies within 6 yds.

Effect of your Mastery increased by 25%.

Pummels all targets in front of you, dealing 618,115 Physical damage to your primary target and 333,782 damage to all other enemies over 3.1 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Can be channeled while moving.

Fists of Fury's damage is increased by 100% of your haste and Fists of Fury does 10% more damage each time it deals damage, resetting when Fists of Fury ends.

Your auto attack speed is increased by 60% for 8 sec after Fists of Fury ends.

While out of combat, your Chi balances to 2 instead of depleting to empty.

Every 15 sec, your next Tiger Palm also casts Expel Harm and deals 30% additional damage.

 Expel Harm
Expel negative chi from your body, healing for 1.1 million and dealing 25% of the amount healed as Nature damage to an enemy within 20 yards.
Rising Sun Kick increases the damage your target receives from you by 3% for 12 sec. Multiple instances may overlap.

Increases your maximum Chi by 1, maximum Energy by 20, and your Energy regeneration by 10%.
Spinning Crane Kick damage increased by 30% and its radius is increased by 15%.

Tiger Palm causes your next Blackout Kick to strike an additional time, stacking up to 4.

Blackout Kick has a 20% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Rising Sun Kick.
Rising Sun Kick has a chance equal to 100% of your haste to trigger a second time, dealing 313,716 Physical damage and restoring 1 Chi.

Whenever you deal damage to a target with Fists of Fury, you gain a stack of Chi Energy up to a maximum of 30 stacks.

Using Spinning Crane Kick will cause the energy to detonate in a Chi Explosion, dealing 161,247 Nature damage to all enemies within 8 yards, reduced beyond 5 targets. The damage is increased by 5% for each stack of Chi Energy.
The Blackout Kick! effect also increases the damage of your next Blackout Kick by 350%.

Split into 3 elemental spirits for 15 sec, each spirit dealing 40% of normal damage and healing.

You directly control the Storm spirit, while Earth and Fire spirits mimic your attacks on nearby enemies.

While active, casting Storm, Earth, and Fire again will cause the spirits to fixate on your target.
Each successive attack that triggers Combo Strikes in a row grants 1% increased damage, stacking up to 5 times.
Spending Chi has a chance to make your next Spinning Crane Kick free and deal an additional 200% damage.

Activating Storm, Earth, and Fire resets the remaining cooldown of Rising Sun Kick and grants 2 Chi.
